ðŸ“– Summary: The parsec-vdd repository provides a standalone solution for creating virtual displays on Windows hosts using the Parsec Virtual Display Driver (VDD), independent of the Parsec app. It leverages the IddCx API to generate virtual displays with support for high resolutions and refresh rates, making it suitable for gaming, streaming, or remote work.
